subject: Soccer
Credit and Debt
lead_paragraph: Hamstrung by financial difficulties, Parma F.C. endured an embarrassing season. Now the team, playing in a lesser league, has an altered name, a smaller staff and a revised concept of ownership.
snippet: Hamstrung by financial difficulties, Parma F.C. endured an embarrassing season. Now the team, playing in a lesser league, has an altered name, a smaller staff and a revised concept of ownership.
